text: Comerica bank has been around for over
170 years it's a full service bank with
a dominating Commercial Banking position
and followed by retail at wealth
management the major decision we made
was we changed the cloud migration to
cloud modernization and really focused
on the capability it will deliver for
the business we shut down and
decommissioned two out of the three data
centers as you can imagine we're talking
about hundreds and hundreds of workloads
that we migrated
into the popular Cloud it actually
fundamentally reduced the uh the cost
complexity to the it environment so we
use over 50 plus AWS Services all the
way from SAS such as AWS connect to
power hundreds of our agents that
serving the customer every day
to Amazon RDS which is relational
relational database that is infinitely
scalable and resilient developers love
Cloud because they don't have to think
about dealing with four to six months
infrastructure processes but the real
secret is along the way we discovered
the cloud modernization is a team sport
you have bring Partners together along
the way including AWS Professional
Services Architects what we really
should do is leverage the collective
wisdom to start thinking bigger and to
make the bigger dream possible
